title: IS ASMR A FORM OF HYPNOSIS? / Explanation & demonstrations with Dr. Marco Paret
description:
ASMR - Autonomous sensory meridian response, is a tingling sensation that usually begins on the scalp and moves down the back of the neck and upper spine. A pleasant form of paresthesia, it has been compared with auditory-tactile synesthesia and may overlap with frisson. But is ASMR a form of hypnosis? Dr. Paret will answer and demonstrate. This video was captured on his non-verbal hypnosis masterclass. Dr. Paret is the world foremost expert in the power of gaze fascination and mesmerism. In his teachings he completes the practice of what we call hypnosis. His practice goes far beyond the word. Learn the most powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school.
